guix: Drop repetition of option's default value

events.message: guix: Drop repetition of option's default value

events.body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#25484](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25484) (Guix: enable toolchain hardening by default by fanquake)
* [#24123](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24123) ([POC] build: enable Pointer Authentication and Branch Target Identification for aarch64 (Linux) by fanquake)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
Guix build hashes has been added to the PR description.
